page.title: 18HOUSING IN PRENTON
page.content: The{Prenton Dell}estate is a residential estate of private and council housing, consisting mainly of semi-detached houses. The tallest buildings are 4 storey flats.{74%}of the children in our school live in semi-detached houses,{18%}in detached, {5%}in terraced, and only{3%}live in flats. A new private estate is being developed on land which used to be a {brickworks.}125 houses are planned to be built, with from 1 to 3 bedrooms. Some styles are terraced. The prices of the houses range from Â£18 350 to Â£28 195. They are making front and rear gardens. There is a special offer for first and second time buyers. If they pay the full price, they get carpets, curtains, a cooker, a washing machine, and a refrigerator fitted.
